thread.section_title: London Marriott Hotel County Hall - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable and Stylish
thread.title_full: Comfortable and Stylish - Review of London Marriott Hotel County Hall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lauren R
title: Comfortable and Stylish
text:
When arriving our bags were carried to the front desk for us where check in was easy and quick, we were shown were to go and told all about what we could find in the hotel. The room itself was clean and well presented. Although in my opinion there was a small variety to eat, breakfast was lovely and there was always plenty of what was out to ensure you'd eaten enough.
Well worth a stay here if you are visiting London as it is situated at one end of the bridge so for some the view is of the London Eye, Big Ben and the passing streets below - beautiful!
